instructions: Open the YouTube app on your iOS or Android smartphone or tablet. Tap on your profile picture in the top-right corner. Select Paid memberships . Under YouTube Premium , tap on Manage . You're asked to open a link in a web browser app. Select Open next to the browser you want to use. Your selected internet browser should open and load the mobile web version of your paid memberships. Under YouTube Premium , select Cancel Membership . Select Yes, cancel to confirm your cancellation of YouTube Premium.
